title: The Guide (Wommat)
text: The Guide (Wommat) is the seventh <a href="Album">studio album</a> by <a href="Senegal">Senegal</a>ese <a href="Singing">singer</a> and <a href="composer">composer</a> <a href="Youssou%20N%27Dour">Youssou N'Dour</a>. Recorded during the autumn of 1993 in both <a href="New%20York%20City">New York City</a> and <a href="Dakar">Dakar</a>, the album was released on July 11, 1994, through <a href="Columbia%20Records">Columbia Records</a>. Featuring the hit single "<a href="7%20Seconds%20%28song%29">7 Seconds</a>", a duet with <a href="Neneh%20Cherry">Neneh Cherry</a>, "The Guide (Wommat)" is the commercially most successful album by Youssou N'Dour.
